title: Create a Ghost

sections.heading: HOW TO PLAY
sections.body:
• Connect a wired or wireless switch and a fan or hairdryer to an appliance controller.
• Set the appliance controller to direct mode so the fan or hairdryer is activated while the switch is pressed.
• Pour a blob of white paint onto the bottom of the black paper and place it on a surface close to the fan or hairdryer so the air will blow the paint up the paper.
• Prompt the switch user to press the switch to create their ghost!
• Add googly eyes or glitter as an optional extra.

tooltipText: Use an appliance controller to use a fan and paint to create a ghost
